source.b62e0f41:
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd
np.set_printoptions(threshold=np.inf)

selected_country='Sweden'
df = pd.read_csv('../input/novel-corona-virus-2019-dataset/covid_19_data.csv',header=0)
df = df[df['Country/Region']==selected_country]
df = df.groupby('ObservationDate').sum()
print(df)
source.5e427ffc:
from plotly.offline import iplot
import plotly.graph_objs as go

daily_confirmed_object = go.Scatter(x=df.index,y=df['daily_confirmed'].values,name='Daily confirmed')
daily_deaths_object = go.Scatter(x=df.index,y=df['daily_deaths'].values,name='Daily deaths')
daily_recovery_object = go.Scatter(x=df.index,y=df['daily_recovery'].values,name='Daily recovery')

layout_object = go.Layout(title='Sweden daily cases 17B10726',xaxis=dict(title='Date'),yaxis=dict(title='Number of people'))
fig=go.Figure(data=[daily_confirmed_object,daily_deaths_object,daily_recovery_object],layout=layout_object)
iplot(fig)
fig.write_html('Sweden_daily_cases_17B10726.html')
source.82aaf47f:
Sweden does not conduct strong policy such as lockdown to ensure the people right of acting freely.
(It means that commercial facility can open and students can go to schools in Sweden.)
Also there is the purpose of getting collective immunity for coronavirus.

The Public Health Agency of Sweden coordinates disease control and the National Board of Health and Welfare supports and coordinates the health and medical care.

The government conducted some measures with these agencies.
For example, she incresed intensive care beds, provided medical equipment including masks, and deducted sick pay standard.

Because of the high number of elderly death toll, a boost for care of the elderly was being implemented as the new measure on May 12th.

But the number of daily deaths takes relatively large number (10 to 100) constantly still now.
Also the number of daily confirmed seems not decrease.

However, Anders Tegnell who has led the country’s coronavirus response says "the country is past the peak of infections" and seems not conduct the tighter measure.

source.3e45f261:
The number of daily recovey is unreliable.
Because it has a minus number and it takes 0 at most of the days.

But the number of daily confirmed and the number of daily deaths seem no problem.

The largest peak of of daily confirmed is 2214 on June 3rd in 2020 and it is in the period of June 1st to June 8th.

Also the largest peak of daily deaths is 185 on April 21st in 2020, though it has no ramarkable peak and repeats up and down.

So I want to know the effect of the policy.
